lead_paragraph: Goaltender Roberto Luongo made 40 saves for Florida, which ended a seven-game losing streak against the Rangers.

headline.print_headline: Panthers Shut Out Rangers For Eighth Straight Victory
headline.main: Panthers Shut Out Rangers for Eighth Straight Victory

snippet: Goaltender Roberto Luongo made 40 saves for Florida, which ended a seven-game losing streak against the Rangers.
abstract: Carolina Panthers defeat New York Rangers, 3-0.
